S0D-in: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range,  draining moisture and vitality from it. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. The target takes 8d8 necrotic damage on a failed save,  or half as much damage on a successful one. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
S1D-in: If you target a plant creature or a magical plant,  it makes the saving throw with disadvantage,  and the spell deals maximum damage to it.
S2D-in: If you target a nonmagical plant that isn't a creature,  such as a tree or shrub,  it doesn't make a saving throw,  it simply withers and dies.
entriesHigherLevel-in: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher,  the damage increases by scaledamage 8d8|4-9|1d8 for each slot level above 4th.
